name: Flag Racers
description:
Race a friend through a randomly generated maze! Collect flags to earn 500 points, and push into your opponent to collect 600 points while gaining access to a power. The game ends when 3 flags have been collected.

This is my first game using Gamemaker Studio. Its not very good, but I just wanted to show my progress using the engine so far.

Programming and art by Peas_N_Carrots

Gameplay music by crazyboycodes.com

Menu music by  https://www.reddit.com/user/How2Bboss/
